channel.title: Looking for Client/Server coder (Offering CO-Owner)
channel.description:
I need someone who is very good at re-coding clients mainly, and what the add to the client into the server.
Like things like this, I want to change this: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/a3civo.png[/img] To the current one in Real Runescape, also adding the emotes and skillcape emotes in server.
Anyone interested?
